ProductInfo.Features:
Hi-Resolution IP Network Camera with excellent infrared night vision(Max 50 feet) via 12 infrared high power LEDs
The latest H.264 compression technology allows the Bullet to efficiently utilize your network, even with the highest-quality video
Monitor and record live video and audio from anywhere.
The bullet range is equipped with Power over Ethernet support and can receive both power and data over a single Ethernet network cable
Built-in IR Cut Filter producing truly gorgeous colors in the day and night
ProductInfo.Name: TriVision H.264 POE Waterproof Outdoor IP Camera 45ft Night Vision IR Cut Remote Detect CCTV Surveillance(NC-316P)
